trans-unit.source: Altar's Light
trans-unit.target: 祭坛明光

trans-unit.resname: MRD·1 | Altar's Light | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Remove target artifact or enchantment from the game.
trans-unit.target: 将目标神器或结界移出对战。

trans-unit.source: "The altar does nothing; the device is crushed under the weight of its own impurity."\n—Ushanti, leonin seer
trans-unit.target: 「这装置是因自身的不净而崩毁，毋须祭坛干预。」\n～狮族先知乌珊提

trans-unit.source: Arrest
trans-unit.target: 逮捕

trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be played.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物不能进行攻击或阻挡，并且不能使用其起动式异能。

trans-unit.source: "Unfortunately, it doesn't restrain the beast's smell."\n—Glissa Sunseeker
trans-unit.target: 「可惜这没办法掩住野兽体臭。」\n～寻日者格莉莎

trans-unit.source: Auriok Bladewarden
trans-unit.target: 欧瑞克剑卫

trans-unit.resname: MRD·3 | Auriok Bladewarden | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is CARDNAME's power.
trans-unit.target: {T}：目标生物得+X/+X直到回合结束，X为CARDNAME的力量。

trans-unit.source: The Auriok have learned through constant struggle that allies are more precious than water.
trans-unit.target: 从长年的争战中，欧瑞克人学到了盟友远比清水重要。

trans-unit.source: Auriok Steelshaper
trans-unit.target: 欧瑞克塑铁军

trans-unit.resname: MRD·4 | Auriok Steelshaper | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Equip costs you pay cost {1} less.
trans-unit.target: 你使用的佩带费用减少{1}来使用。

trans-unit.resname: MRD·4 | Auriok Steelshaper | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: As long as CARDNAME is equipped, Soldiers and Knights you control get +1/+1.
trans-unit.target: 只要CARDNAME佩带武具，由你操控的士兵与骑士便各得+1/+1。

trans-unit.source: They put their safety in his hands. He puts sharpened steel in theirs.
trans-unit.target: 他们将安全交付给他；他则把磨利的刀刃交还回去。

trans-unit.source: Auriok Transfixer
trans-unit.target: 欧瑞克停机手

trans-unit.resname: MRD·5 | Auriok Transfixer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {W}, {T}: Tap target artifact.
trans-unit.target: {W}，{T}：横置目标神器。

trans-unit.source: "My grandfather knew enough spells to fill a hundred scrolls. Nowadays, if a spell cannot fight the levelers, it is not even taught to our young."
trans-unit.target: 「我祖父通晓的咒语足以写满百余张卷轴。到了现在，没办法对付夷平者的咒语根本就不会传授给后代。」

trans-unit.source: Awe Strike
trans-unit.target: 一击之威

trans-unit.resname: MRD·6 | Awe Strike | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: The next time target creature would deal damage this turn, prevent that damage. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way.
trans-unit.target: 防止目标生物下一次在本回合中将造成的伤害。你获得与以此法所防止的伤害等量的生命。

trans-unit.source: Stunned by the mere presence of the leonin kha, the nim raider quickly fell to its knees.
trans-unit.target: 泞族为狮王之威态慑服，纷纷屈膝投降。

trans-unit.source: Blinding Beam
trans-unit.target: 眩目光束

trans-unit.resname: MRD·7 | Blinding Beam | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose one Tap two target creatures; or creatures don't untap during target player's next untap step.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～横置两个目标生物；或生物于目标牌手的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.resname: MRD·7 | Blinding Beam | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Entwine {1} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)
trans-unit.target: 打包{1}（若你支付打包费用，则两项都选择。）

trans-unit.source: Leonin Abunas
trans-unit.target: 狮族高僧

trans-unit.resname: MRD·8 | Leonin Abunas | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Artifacts you control can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的神器不能成为由对手所操控之咒语或异能的目标。

trans-unit.source: Only leonin clerics who can survive the Razor Fields for one turning of the suns can stand in the Cave of Light.
trans-unit.target: 能在锐草原野中活过一次四阳轮转的狮族僧侣，才有资格进入明光洞窟。

trans-unit.source: Leonin Den-Guard
trans-unit.target: 狮穴守卫

trans-unit.resname: MRD·9 | Leonin Den-Guard | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As long as CARDNAME is equipped, it gets +1/+1 and attacking doesn't cause it to tap.
trans-unit.target: 只要CARDNAME佩带武具，它得+1/+1且攻击时不需横置。

trans-unit.source: No one under the four suns can elude the watchful eye of the den-guard.
trans-unit.target: 在四阳底下，没人能避开守卫的严密监视。

trans-unit.source: Leonin Elder
trans-unit.target: 狮族长老

trans-unit.resname: MRD·10 | Leonin Elder | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever an artifact comes into play, you may gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个神器进场时，你可以获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "The wisdom of the elders is just as much a weapon as a sword or spear. We must learn to wield it."\n—Ushanti, leonin seer
trans-unit.target: 「长老的智慧有若剑矛，必得学习以应用之。」\n～狮族先知乌珊提

trans-unit.source: Leonin Skyhunter
trans-unit.target: 狮族空猎者

trans-unit.resname: MRD·11 | Leonin Skyhunter | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.source: The skyhunters were born when the first leonin gazed at the heavens and wished to hunt the birds overhead.
trans-unit.target: 曾有个狮族仰望天空，想要猎捕头顶上的飞鸟；空猎者就此诞生。

trans-unit.source: Loxodon Mender
trans-unit.target: 象族修理师

trans-unit.resname: MRD·12 | Loxodon Mender | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {W}, {T}: Regenerate target artifact.
trans-unit.target: {W}，{T}：重生目标神器。

trans-unit.source: The Auriok believe that in the hands of a loxodon, no weapon can be broken.
trans-unit.target: 欧瑞克人相信：在象族手中，任何武器都能修复。

trans-unit.source: Loxodon Peacekeeper
trans-unit.target: 象族和平护卫

trans-unit.resname: MRD·13 | Loxodon Peacekeeper | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, the player with the lowest life total gains control of CARDNAME. If two or more players are tied for lowest life total, you choose one of them, and that player gains control of CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，总生命最低的牌手获得CARDNAME的操控权。若两位以上的牌手同时有最低的总生命，则你选择其中一位牌手，该牌手获得CARDNAME的操控权。

trans-unit.source: Loxodon Punisher
trans-unit.target: 象族惩罚者

trans-unit.resname: MRD·14 | Loxodon Punisher | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME gets +2/+2 for each Equipment attached to it.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME每装备一个武具，便得+2/+2。

trans-unit.source: The loxodons believe punishment comes in two steps: pain and atonement. They carry a weapon for each.
trans-unit.target: 象族认为惩罚有两个步骤：苦痛与赎罪。他们的武器为其分别发挥功用。

trans-unit.source: Luminous Angel
trans-unit.target: 灿光天使

trans-unit.resname: MRD·15 | Luminous Angel | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: MRD·15 | Luminous Angel | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying into play.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，你可以将一个1/1白色，具有飞行异能的精怪衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.resname: MRD·16 | Raise the Alarm | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Raise the Alarm
trans-unit.target: 扬起警报

trans-unit.resname: MRD·16 | Raise the Alarm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Put two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens into play.
trans-unit.target: 将两个1/1白色士兵衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.resname: MRD·16 | Raise the Alarm | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The nim raid our homes without warning. We must defend our homes without hesitation."
trans-unit.target: 「泞族毫无预警地袭击家园；我们必得义无反顾地保卫她。」

trans-unit.source: Razor Barrier
trans-unit.target: 锐草护御

trans-unit.resname: MRD·17 | Razor Barrier | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target permanent you control gains protection from artifacts or from the color of your choice until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 选择一种颜色，目标由你操控的永久物获得反神器或反该色保护异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "We protect our homelands. Why should they not protect us?"
trans-unit.target: 「我们保卫著家园，家园怎可能不作回报？」

trans-unit.resname: MRD·18 | Roar of the Kha | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Roar of the Kha
trans-unit.target: 狮王咆哮

trans-unit.resname: MRD·18 | Roar of the Kha | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose one Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn; or untap all creatures you control.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～由你操控的生物得+1/+1直到回合结束；或重置所有由你操控的生物。

trans-unit.resname: MRD·18 | Roar of the Kha | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Entwine {1}{W} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)
trans-unit.target: 打包{1}{W}（若你支付打包费用，则两项都选择。）

trans-unit.resname: MRD·19 | Rule of Law | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rule of Law
trans-unit.target: 依法治理

trans-unit.resname: MRD·19 | Rule of Law | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player can't play more than one spell each turn.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手每回合不能使用一个以上的咒语。

trans-unit.resname: MRD·19 | Rule of Law | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Appointed by the kha himself, members of the tribunal ensure all disputes are settled with the utmost fairness.
trans-unit.target: 裁决所的成员由狮王亲自指派，以确保所有争端都得到最公正的解决。

trans-unit.source: Second Sunrise
trans-unit.target: 二度日升

trans-unit.resname: MRD·20 | Second Sunrise | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player returns to play all artifact, creature, enchantment, and land cards that were put into his or her graveyard from play this turn.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手将在本回合中从场上进入其坟墓场的所有神器，生物，结界及地牌移回场上。

trans-unit.source: The bright tunnel sometimes leads back to life.
trans-unit.target: 这明亮通道有时能引领生命回头。

trans-unit.source: Skyhunter Cub
trans-unit.target: 幼狮空猎者

trans-unit.resname: MRD·21 | Skyhunter Cub | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As long as CARDNAME is equipped, it gets +1/+1 and has flying.
trans-unit.target: 只要CARDNAME佩带武具，它得+1/+1且具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.source: Every young leonin wishes to become a skyhunter, for they soar closest to the suns.
trans-unit.target: 每个年轻的狮族都期望成为空猎者，傍日翱翔长空。

trans-unit.source: Skyhunter Patrol
trans-unit.target: 巡防空猎者

trans-unit.resname: MRD·22 | Skyhunter Patrol | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, first strike
trans-unit.target: 飞行，先攻

trans-unit.source: "They are the first to raise the alarm when the levelers attack, and the first to risk their lives to defend the pride."\n—Raksha Golden Cub, leonin kha
trans-unit.target: 「他们是最先发现夷平者、送出警报，也是第一批冒生命危险捍卫尊严的人。」\n～金狮王洛夏

trans-unit.source: Slith Ascendant
trans-unit.target: 扬升斯立兹

trans-unit.resname: MRD·23 | Slith Ascendant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: MRD·23 | Slith Ascendant | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Instinctively drawn to the light of its "mother-sun," each slith follows that sun's path around Mirrodin.
trans-unit.target: 斯立兹依其本能追逐「母阳」光辉，在秘罗地顺著各个太阳的运行轨迹出没。

trans-unit.source: Solar Tide
trans-unit.target: 炽阳浪潮

trans-unit.resname: MRD·24 | Solar Tide | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Choose one Destroy all creatures with power 2 or less; or destroy all creatures with power 3 or greater.\nEntwine—\nSacrifice two lands. (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～消灭所有力量等于或小于2的生物；或消灭所有力量等于或大于3的生物。\n打包～牺牲两个地。（若你支付打包费用，则两项都选择。）

trans-unit.source: Soul Nova
trans-unit.target: 灵魂散华

trans-unit.resname: MRD·25 | Soul Nova | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Remove target attacking creature and all Equipment attached to it from the game.
trans-unit.target: 将目标进行攻击的生物及其装备的所有武具移出对战。

trans-unit.source: Within seconds, the nim was consumed in blinding sunfire. Afterwards, only a puddle of molten iron remained.
trans-unit.target: 不出几秒，泞族便遭眩目阳焰吞噬；之后仅余一滩融铁。

trans-unit.resname: MRD·26 | Sphere of Purity | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sphere of Purity
trans-unit.target: 纯净护圈

trans-unit.resname: MRD·26 | Sphere of Purity | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If an artifact would deal damage to you, prevent 1 of that damage.
trans-unit.target: 若任何神器将对你造成伤害，则防止该伤害中的1点。

trans-unit.resname: MRD·26 | Sphere of Purity | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Purity rejects artifice.
trans-unit.target: 纯净拒斥狡计。

trans-unit.source: Taj-Nar Swordsmith
trans-unit.target: 塔吉纳锻剑兵

trans-unit.resname: MRD·27 | Taj-Nar Swordsmith | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, you may pay {X}. If you do, search your library for an Equipment card with converted mana cost X or less and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，你可以支付{X}。若你如此作，从你的牌库中搜寻一张总法术力费用等于或小于X的武具牌，并将之放置进场。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: MRD·28 | Tempest of Light | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tempest of Light
trans-unit.target: 明光风暴

trans-unit.resname: MRD·28 | Tempest of Light | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy all enchantments.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有结界。

trans-unit.resname: MRD·28 | Tempest of Light | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "This world reeks of another's hand. Someone or something is defying the power of the gods and shaping this planet. I intend for it to stop."\n—Glissa Sunseeker
trans-unit.target: 「这世界已遭邪恶染指；某件事物正违抗神的力量，欲依其意塑造天下。我绝不能让它得逞。」\n～寻日者格莉莎

trans-unit.source: Annul
trans-unit.target: 抹除

trans-unit.source: Counter target artifact or enchantment spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标神器或结界咒语。

trans-unit.source: "Murder of the living is tragic, but murder of the idea is unforgivable."\n—Janus, speaker of the synod
trans-unit.target: 「残害生灵固是悲剧，而残害创意可是天理不容。」\n～悉诺议长杰努斯

trans-unit.source: Assert Authority
trans-unit.target: 维护威信

trans-unit.resname: MRD·30 | Assert Authority | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to play for each artifact you control.)
trans-unit.target: 神器共鸣（你每操控一个神器，使用此咒语的费用便减少{1}来使用）

trans-unit.resname: MRD·30 | Assert Authority | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell. If it's countered this way, remove it from the game instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。若该咒语以此法被反击，则改为将之移出对战，而非置入其拥有者的坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: Broodstar
trans-unit.target: 晦月星

trans-unit.source: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to play for each artifact you control.)
trans-unit.target: 神器共鸣（你每操控一个神器，使用此咒语的费用便减少{1}来使用）

trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifacts you control.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME的力量及防御力各等同于由你操控的神器之数量。

trans-unit.source: Disarm
trans-unit.target: 解除武装

trans-unit.source: Unattach all Equipment from target creature.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物上的所有武具均卸装。

trans-unit.source: "Be thankful I left you your clothes."
trans-unit.target: 「我把衣服留给你，已是大发慈悲了。」

trans-unit.source: Domineer
trans-unit.target: 管理支配

trans-unit.source: You control enchanted artifact creature.
trans-unit.target: 你操控受此结界的神器生物。

trans-unit.source: Since they haven't seen their original master for millennia, golems are eager to take orders from anyone.
trans-unit.target: 魔像已有数千年未见过主人，亟欲获令行事。

trans-unit.source: Dream's Grip
trans-unit.target: 幻梦之攫

trans-unit.resname: MRD·34 | Dream's Grip | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose one Tap target permanent; or untap target permanent.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～横置目标永久物；或重置目标永久物。

trans-unit.resname: MRD·34 | Dream's Grip | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Entwine {1} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)
trans-unit.target: 打包{1}（若你支付打包费用，则两项都选择。）

trans-unit.source: Fabricate
trans-unit.target: 装配

trans-unit.source: Search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张神器牌，展示该牌，并置于你手上。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: "The secret to invention is to see something in your mind, then find where it hides in the world."
trans-unit.target: 「发明的秘诀便是先于心中看见某物，之后找到它在世上藏身之处。」

trans-unit.source: Fatespinner
trans-unit.target: 纺命师

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, that player chooses draw step, main phase, or combat phase. The player skips each instance of the chosen step or phase this turn.
trans-unit.target: 在每位对手的维持开始时，该牌手选择抓牌步骤，行动阶段，或是战斗阶段。该牌手在本回合中略过所选择的每一种步骤或阶段。

trans-unit.source: No one knows what she is watching, but she never takes her eyes off it.
trans-unit.target: 没人知道她目不转睛盯著的到底是什么。

trans-unit.source: Inertia Bubble
trans-unit.target: 惯性气泡

trans-unit.resname: MRD·37 | Inertia Bubble | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchanted artifact doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的神器于其操控者的重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.source: "I wouldn't want you to hurt yourself."\n—Bruenna, Neurok leader
trans-unit.target: 「我不想让你伤了自己。」\n～纽若克统领布威娜

trans-unit.source: Looming Hoverguard
trans-unit.target: 昏暗空卫

trans-unit.resname: MRD·38 | Looming Hoverguard | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: MRD·38 | Looming Hoverguard | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, put target artifact on top of its owner's library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，将目标神器置于其拥有者的牌库顶。

trans-unit.source: Although mute, hoverguards get their message across loud and clear.
trans-unit.target: 虽然听似无声，空卫依旧能清晰地交换讯息。

trans-unit.source: Lumengrid Augur
trans-unit.target: 博识都卜算师

trans-unit.resname: MRD·39 | Lumengrid Augur | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}: Target player draws a card, then discards a card from his or her hand. If that player discards an artifact card this way, untap CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: {1}，{T}：目标牌手抓一张牌，然后从其手上弃掉一张牌。若该牌手以此法弃掉神器牌，则重置CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: Information pumps like blood through vedalken society.
trans-unit.target: 资讯如血液般奔流，穿梭于维多肯社群中。

trans-unit.source: Lumengrid Sentinel
trans-unit.target: 博识都哨兵

trans-unit.resname: MRD·40 | Lumengrid Sentinel | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: MRD·40 | Lumengrid Sentinel | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever an artifact comes into play under your control, you may tap target permanent.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个神器在你的操控下进场时，你可以横置目标永久物。

trans-unit.source: The vedalken order their Neurok sentinels to watch over the shores of the Quicksilver Sea, as if they know of intruders yet to come.
trans-unit.target: 维多肯族命令纽若克哨兵监视水银海沿岸，好似知晓入侵者终将由此到来。

trans-unit.source: Lumengrid Warden
trans-unit.target: 博识都护持师

trans-unit.source: The Neurok, like the vedalken, are on a constant quest for knowledge. It is their currency, their trade, their life.
trans-unit.target: 纽若克人与维多肯族的共同点，就是不停地追寻知识。这是他们的货币，行业，以及生命。

trans-unit.resname: MRD·42 | March of the Machines | Card Name
trans-unit.source: March of the Machines
trans-unit.target: 器械进击

trans-unit.resname: MRD·42 | March of the Machines | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each noncreature artifact is an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its converted mana cost. (Equipment that's a creature can't equip a creature.)
trans-unit.target: 每个非生物的神器都是神器生物，并且力量和防御力各等同于其总法术力费用。（若武具本身是生物，便无法装备在生物上）

trans-unit.source: Neurok Familiar
trans-unit.target: 纽若克佣兽

trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: MRD·43 | Neurok Familiar | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, reveal the top card of your library. If it's an artifact card, put it into your hand. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，展示你的牌库顶牌。若是神器牌，则将该牌置于你手上；若不是，则将该牌置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.target: 纽若克间谍

trans-unit.source: From the murk of Mephidross to the heart of Kuldotha, the vedalken send their servants forth to gather knowledge from every inch of Mirrodin.
trans-unit.target: 为了收集秘罗地的所有知识，从蔓非沼暗处到库度沙中心，都有维多肯族派出的仆役在进行调查。

trans-unit.source: "The Knowledge Pool has all the answers—especially 'No.'"
trans-unit.target: 「知识之池里有各种各样的答案～尤其是『不行』。」

trans-unit.source: The vedalken always put their best thought forward.
trans-unit.target: 维多肯族总会提出最好的想法。

trans-unit.target: 为CARDNAME的异能支付起动费用时，你可以将蓝色法术力视同任意颜色的法术力一般地来支付。

trans-unit.source: "Once cast, a spell can be undone. But once revealed, a secret can never again be kept."\n—Pontifex, elder researcher
trans-unit.target: 「已发出的咒语能够取消，但已泄露的秘密则无法收回。」\n～大学者庞棣飞

trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}: You gain 1 life.

trans-unit.source: Druids converted swaths of the Tangle into tanglebloom orchards. Though heavy tools are needed to cut a leaf in the Tangle, tanglebloom fruit is easily plucked by hand.
trans-unit.target: 德鲁伊将铬铜林的大片空地转化成铬铜花果园。虽然铬铜林连片树叶都得用重型工具才能对付，但铬铜花果却可以随手采摘。

trans-unit.source: Tangleroot
trans-unit.target: 铬铜根

trans-unit.source: As if there's glitch in the system, the Tangle sometimes folds in on itself, throwing off sparks of mana in a mystifying display.
trans-unit.target: 铬铜林有时会向内部蜷曲，抛射神秘的法术火光，好像是系统失调一般。

trans-unit.source: Etched on Tel-Jilad's trunk is an entire history of Mirrodin—except for an expanse near the ground scrubbed smooth by an unknown hand.
trans-unit.target: 蚀刻在泰几朗躯干上的，是秘罗地的历史全文～除了近地表处的一大片空白，不知被何人抹平。

trans-unit.source: Thought Prison
trans-unit.target: 思想监禁

trans-unit.resname: MRD·261 | Thought Prison | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Imprint When CARDNAME comes into play, you may have target player reveal his or her hand. If you do, choose a nonland card from it and remove that card from the game. (The removed card is imprinted on this artifact.)
trans-unit.target: 压印～当CARDNAME进场时，你可以使目标牌手展示其手牌。若你如此作，选择其中一张非地的牌并将它移出对战。（被移出对战的牌压印在此神器上）

trans-unit.resname: MRD·261 | Thought Prison | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player plays a spell that shares a color or converted mana cost with the imprinted card, CARDNAME deals 2 damage to that player.
trans-unit.target: 每当牌手使用咒语时，若它与压印的牌有共通的颜色或是总法术力费用相同，则CARDNAME对该牌手造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Timesifter
trans-unit.target: 滤时计

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, each player removes the top card of his or her library from the game. The player who removed the card with the highest converted mana cost takes an extra turn after this one. If two or more players' cards are tied for highest cost, the tied players repeat this process until the tie is broken.
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手的维持开始时，每位牌手各将其牌库顶牌移出对战。比较这些牌的总法术力费用，数字最大的牌手在本回合后额外得到一个回合。若最大的数字出现平手，则平手的牌手重复此过程，直到分出结果为止。
